name: Infernal Clash
description:
Satan was bored and decided to throw a dodgeball tournament for his entertainment. Play as either the highest level demon general Ulgh'aar, or follow the path of the demons slayer Dante that is seeking power to be able to get rid of all of hell.

Inferno Clash is a 2 player 1v1 game where you need quick reflexes in order to outpoint your enemy. You get 90 seconds to get more points than the enemy and claim the hellish crown.

Made by:

Nastiya Kamiakova - pixel artist, visual effects

Czarek Mildner - Music, programming, Putting stuff together
